@notice Allow the owner of address `aproducer.address()` to
         act as a producer (by offering energy).

devdoc.author: Bjrn Stein, Quantum-Factory GmbH,                      https://quantum-factory.de

buy_energy(address,uint32,uint32,uint64).details: This function is meant to be called by a Lition customer      who has chosen to be registered for this ability and to      decline anonymization by randomization of user ID.

params.aday: Day for which the offer is valid.
params.aenergy: Energy to be offered in mWh
params.aprice: Price surcharge in millicent/kWh above market        price
params.aproducer: Address of the producer offering the energy        to be bought.

buy_energy(address,uint32,uint32,uint64,.details: This function is meant to be called by Lition on behalf      of customers.

params.aday: Day for which the offer is valid.
params.aenergy: Energy to be offered in mWh
params.aprice: Price surcharge in millicent/kWh above market        price
params.aproducer: Address of the producer offering the energy        to be bought.

params.aday: Day for which the offer is valid.
params.aenergy: Energy to be offered in mWh
params.aprice: Price surcharge in millicent/kWh above market        price

registerConsumer(address,uint32).details: Register address aconsumer to belong to userID      auserID. Addresses can be delisted ("unregistered") by      setting the userID auserID to zero.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: The Lition Smart Contract, initial development version.

buy_energy(address,uint32,uint32,uint64).notice: Buy `(aenergy / 1.0e6).toFixed(6)` kWh of energy on          for day `aday` at a surcharge `(aprice /          1.0e3).toFixed(3)` ct/kWh from the energy producer          using the address `aproducer.address()`.

buy_energy(address,uint32,uint32,uint64,.notice: Buy `(aenergy / 1.0e6).toFixed(6)` kWh of energy on         behalf of user id `auserID` (possibly de-anonymized by         randomization) for day `aday` at a surcharge `(aprice         / 1.0e3).toFixed(3)` ct/kWh from the energy producer         using the address `aproducer.address()` whilst         asserting that the current time in seconds since 1970         is `(atimestamp / 1.0e9)` seconds.

deregisterProducer(address).notice: Cease allowing the owner of address         `aproducer.address()` to act as a producer (by         offering energy).

offer_energy(uint32,uint32,uint64,uint64.notice: Offer `(aenergy / 1.0e6).toFixed(6)` kWh of energy for         day `aday` at a price `(aprice / 1.0e3).toFixed(3) + '         ct/kWh'` above market price for a date given as day         `aday` whilst asserting that the current date and time         in nanoseconds since 1970 is `atimestamp`.

registerConsumer(address,uint32).notice: Allow the owner of the address `aconsumer.address()`         to make transactions on behalf of user id `auserID`.

registerProducer(address).notice: Allow the owner of address `aproducer.address()` to         act as a producer (by offering energy).
